Transitions

La BOEW v4.0 seulement

Ce composant est seulement disponible à partir de la BOEW v4.0.

  • Documentation
  • Questions ou commentaires?

Purpose: create a transition class with optional states.

Fade

Hover mouse over space below to trigger fade-in (300ms)

Hover mouse over space below to trigger fade-out (500ms)



Slide

Hover mouse over space below to trigger slide-left (300ms)


Hover mouse over space below to trigger slide-right (500ms)
